title: life cycle data
description: Life-cycle datasets of building envelope components. It shall be possible to exchange the most important data about circularity, life-cycle analysis and compliance. At the same time, this general format is intended to limit the number of possible representations of one dataset to make it easy to develop software which interprets the data correctly.

data.title: The object is used to define life cycle data.

functionalUnit.description: The unit used to measure the component.

defaultFunctionalUnitAmount.description: Describes the default functional unit value. For a quantity/volume product, this describes the default volume (m3), for area product the default area (m2), length product the default length (m) and for weight product the default weight (kg)

fixedHeight.description: This value describes the fixed height (m) of an area product

fixedArea.description: This values describes the fixed area (m2) of a length product

density.description: The product density in kg/[functional unit].

weight.description: The weight in kg for a quantity product.

renewablesSustainablyProduced.description: Share of sustainably produced renewable content

availableForRecycle.description: Share of material available for recycling

landfill.description: Share of material sent to landfill

incineration.description: Share of material treated by incineration

availableForReuse.description: Share of material available for reuse

items.description: There can be multiple LCAs per product, each item is one LCA of the product

UUID.description: The universally unique identifier of this life-cycle analysis.

isoCode.description: The 2 letter iso code for the country the EPD is valid in. It is possible that for the same product in different countries different EPDs apply.

compliance.description: List of norms this specific LCA dataset complies with (not the whole product itself)

phaseId.description: Life cycle phase id. `A1_A3` covers the phases `A1`, `A2` and `A3`.

acidificationPotentialOfLandAndWater.description: Acidification potential of land and water (AP) (kg SO2e)

perm.description: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM) (MJ)

pert.description: Total use of renewable primary energy resources (PERT) (MJ)

penre.description: Use of non renewable primary energy (PENRE) (MJ)

penrm.description: Use of non renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM) (MJ)

penrt.description: Total use of non renewable primary energy resource (PENRT) (MJ)

nrsf.description: Use of non renewable secondary fuels (NRSF) (MJ)

perm.description: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM) (MJ)

pert.description: Total use of renewable primary energy resources (PERT) (MJ)

penre.description: Use of non renewable primary energy (PENRE) (MJ)

penrm.description: Use of non renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM) (MJ)

penrt.description: Total use of non renewable primary energy resource (PENRT) (MJ)

nrsf.description: Use of non renewable secondary fuels (NRSF) (MJ)

globalWarmingPotentialLuluc.description: Global Warming Potential Land use and Land use change (GWP-luluc) (kg CO2e)

potentialIncidenceOfDiseaseDueToPMEmissi.description: Potential Incidence of disease due to PM emissions

potentialHumanExposureEfficiencyRelative.description: Potential Human Exposure Efficiency relative to U235 (kBq U235 eq)

ecoTox.description: Potential Comparative Toxic Unit for ecosystems (ETP-fw) (CTU-e)

humanToxCancer.description: Potential comparative toxic unit for humans - cancerogenic (CTU-h)

humanToxNonCancer.description:
Potential comparative toxic unit for humans - not
cancerogenic (CTU-h)

productAttributes.description: This object includes the attributes of the product.

SvhcFree.description: The product is free of SVHC (< 0.1%).

BlueAngel.description: Certified with Blue Angel (DE-UZ) or meets the relevant guidelines

MineralUnderground.description: The product is applied to mineral underground

WaterSoluble.description: The product or coating is a water-soluble product according to current Decopaint-Directive (Appendix II).

SolventFree.description: The product is solvent-free in accordance with VdL-RL01

PlasticizerFree.description: The product is free of plasticizers according to VdL-RL01

DustBindingCoating.description: The product is used as a base coat

VocContentPerLiter.description: VOC content (g/l) as per Decopaint RL

WallpaperAdhesive.description: Product is used as wallpaper adhesive

DispersionInsulativeAdhesive.description: The product is used outdoors as a dispersion insulation adhesive.

DecorativePaint.description: The product is a decorative paint or a base coat for a decorative paint.

ConsistsOfPu.description: The product is made of polyurethane (PU).

MaterialCoveringSurface.description: The product is used as a laying material for covering surfaces

Sealing.description: The product is used as a sealant, barrier coating, or screed resin.

AppliedToNaturalStone.description: The product is an impregnation for natural stone, cast stone, or terrazzo floors.

AdhesiveSealant.description: The product is used for spot or line bonding.

ChlorinatedParaffinsFree.description: Chlorinated paraffins free according to MSDS

AirtightSealing.description: Product is used as sealant for creating airtightness at the building envelope

HalogenatedFree.description: The product is free of halogenated propellants (< 0.1%).

FormworkOil.description: Product is used as formwork oil

FireProtection.description: Product is applied to metal as a fire protection coating

HalogenFree.description: The product is free of halogen flame retardants

CorrosivityCategory.description: Which corrosivity category according to DIN EN ISO 12944-2 does the application of the product fall under?

AntiCorrosion.description: The product has or is a corrosion protection coating for metal

EffectCoating.description: The product is or has a effect coating on metal

PuCoating.description: The product is a polyurethane-based coating (PU)

SubstantiationOfEmissions.description: Substantiation of emissions according to MVVTB available

PlasticCoating.description: The product is a PMMA (methyl methacrylate-containing) coating.

IsOsSystems.description: The product is an OS system or meets special durability requirements (excluding markings).

EpoxyCoating.description: The product is an epoxy coating

Marker.description: The product is used as marker

BitumenPrimer.description: Product is used as bitumen primer for inverted roof

WaxOrOil.description: The product is applied as an oil or wax to wood surfaces.

ChemicalWoodPreservation.description: The product has been treated with a chemical wood preservative.

ApplicationClass.description: Wood application class according to DIN 68800-3

OnlyConstructiveWoodProtection.description: Only constructive wood protection according to DIN 68800-2

NaturallyDurableWood.description: Naturally durable wood according to DIN 68800-1

ViableBiocidalProduct.description: All biocides contained in the product are classified as marketable according to 582/2012/EC.

AppliedToLoadBearingStructures.description: The product is installed as a load-bearing component or applied to load-bearing components.

InCanPreservation.description: All biocides contained in the coating are used solely for pot preservation.

PassivatingAgent.description: The product has been anodized or treated with a passivating agent.

ChromCompoundsFree.description: The product or coating is free of chromium VI compounds (<0.1%).

LeadOrCopper.description: Product consists of lead or copper

NonHalogenatedRefrigerant.description: The product uses a halogen-free refrigerant.

HalogenatedFlameRetardantsFree.description: The product is free of halogenated flame retardants (< 0.01%).

AssemblyFoamFastening.description: The product is used as an assembly foam for fastening or gluing insulation.

AssemblyFoamInsulation.description: The product is used exclusively in joints of ETICS insulation boards.

PbbFree.description: The product is free of polybrominated biphenyls (PBB < 0.1%).

PbdeFree.description: The product is free of polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDE < 0.1%).

BoronCompoundsFree.description: The product is free from reproductive toxic boron compounds (< 0.1%).

RigidFoam.description: Product is a drainage or water storage element made of rigid foam

WallCovering.description: The product is used as wall or ceiling covering.

InsulationForBuildingServices.description: Product is used as insulation for building services

BitumenEmulsion.description: The product is a hot processed bitumen product

PuttyUnderWallpapers.description: Product used as putty under wallpapers

SealantForGlass.description: The Product is used exclusively in safety-relevant areas such as glass construction, facades, or fire protection.

EmissionEvaluated.description: Emission evaluated Building product according to the DIBt Principles

MetallicEffectCoating.description: Product is applied to metal as metallic-effect coating

ObjectRelatedProofZinc.description: Object-related proof according to "RegenwasserCheck- ZINK" exists

FilmprotectedWoodStain.description: A film protection agent has been applied to the product.

StructuralTimber.description: The Product is used in structural timber engineering

PvcFree.description: The product is free of PVC

ConsistsOfSmp.description: The product consists of silane-modified polymers (MS-Polymer)

NoChildLabor.description: Free from child and forced labor

NoIllegalMining.description: Free of illegally extracted raw materials

ProcessingInEurope.description: Material extraction and processing in Europe

CsrAvailable.description: CSR report and certificates of origin available

AmineOrOximecuringSiliconFree.description: Product is free of amine- or oxime-curing silicones

IsBiodegradable.description: The formwork oil is readily biodegradable according to OECD 301

EmissionsReductionMeasures.description: Emission reduction measures for heavy metal input were implemented on the building

Reduction5.description: 5% reduction in two impact categories other than the GWP of the product compared to the baseline situation

enum: LBC Compliant that demonstrates content inventory to 0.1% (1000 ppm)

AmountOfContainedRecyclableMaterials.description: Proportion of the product consisting of reusable materials (by mass)

AnsiBifma2019Compliant.description: The product is compliant with ANSI/BIFMA e3-2019 Furniture Sustainability Standard requirements
enum: Section 7.5.1.1 (Pathway 1) 4,5,7 or 8 points and Section 7.5.2.2 (Pathway 2) 3 points

available with Globally Harmonized System of Classification (GHS) labeling

LPCPetalsCompliant.description: The product is compliant with the Living Product Challenge Petals (Materials und Health + Happiness)
